creator: atarlykov@gmail.com
text:
We created project with "HTTP Request" sampler and attached "Regular Expression
Extractor" under it. Response to this sampler is always "302 Moved Temporarily".
"Regular Expression Extractor" was set up to extract value from a header and
place it to some UDV. As the result, during execution of the sampler/extractor,
UDV is NOT defined.

The problem is in org.apache.jmeter.extractor.RegexExtractor class (process()
method). It always check previousResult.getResponseData() to be not empty, even
if extractor is setup to use headers or url string.

The solution is to check correct field (based on user selection):
 previousResult.getResponseHeaders() in case if (useHeaders() == true)
 previousResult.getUrl() in case if (useUrl() == true)
 previousResult.getResponseData() in case if (useBody() == true)

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Already fixed, but not yet in a release, sorry.

If you want to try it, there are recent nightly builds here:

http://people.apache.org/builds/jakarta-jmeter/nightly/

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 40562 ***
